actions.command: execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:wolf,distance=..30] run data modify entity @s AngryAt set from entity @p[tag=deer] UUID
execute at @s as @e[type=minecraft:wolf,distance=..30] run data modify entity @s AngerTime set value 60
